sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Freshly dissected human retina tissue was crosslinked with 1% formaldehyde in PBS for 10 min, quenched with 125 mM glycine for 5 min and frozen until use for Hi-C experiments. Before processing for Hi-C, samples were crosslinked again in 2% formaldehyde for 10 minutes, then quenched with 125 mM glycine 5 min. For HCT116 cell line (ATCC, VA, USA), 7x106 cells were crosslinked with 2% formaldehyde for 10 min, quenched for 5 min with stop solution I, lysed, and processed for Hi-C using ARIMA-Hi-C k ...
sample_description: Healthy female retina, age 75, All_merged_using_Homer.hic, MergeRetina2_Domain_Call_TADs_10kb.bed, all_merge_loops_5kb_fdr_0.01.bedpe
sample_data_processing: Hi-C analysis was performed with HiCUP (Wingett et al., 2015) using Arima-specific in silico digested hg38 genome for the retina samples and the HCT116., Filtered bam files produced by HiCUP have been converted to .hic files using Juicer (Durand et al., 2016) and to HOMER (Heinz et al., 2013; Heinz et al., 2018) tag directories., Retina Hi-C resolution has been estimated at 3.06 kb using HiCRes (Marchal et al., 2022)., Reproducibility between samples as well as correlation with Hi-C from other t ...
supplementary_files_format_and_content: Compartments for each sample in bed format.Consensus binary contact maps for use with Juicer in hic format.Consensus TAD calls in bed format.Consensus loops in bedpe format.

sample_extract_protocol_ch1: ATAC-seq was performed with fresh dissociated cells from five retinas. Tagmentation and library preparation were carried out as described (Buenrostro, 2015) using Nextera DNA Library Prep kit (FC-121-1030, Illumina, San Diego, CA). Dissociated cells were quantified using a hemocytometer, and 50,000 cells were tagmented in a reaction mix containing 5 µl Tn5, 25 µl TD buffer 2X, 20 µl nuclease-free water in a thermomix with 600rpm agitation. The DNA was purified using the “MinElute PCR Purificatio ...
sample_data_processing: ATAC-seq from five human retinas have been analyzed by trimming the reads for Nextera transposase sequence and reducing their size to maximum 25bp using cutadapt (Martin, 2011) and FASTX toolkit (FASTX-Toolkit, RRID:SCR_005534)., Trimmed reads have been mapped on hg38 using bowtie2 (Langmead & Salzberg, 2012) and filtered for quality, duplicates and blacklisted regions (ENCODE dataset ENCFF419RSJ) using samtools (Li et al., 2009)., Two sets of aligned read pairs have been produced: TN5-shifted a ...
supplementary_files_format_and_content: Read coverage with TN5 shift per sample in bigwig format.Accessible peaks per sample without TN5 shift in narrowPeak formatConsensus accessible footprints observed in at least 3 samples in bed formatConsensus super-enhancers called from Cut&Run, ChIP-seq, and ATAC-seq data in bed format

sample_extract_protocol_ch1: Peripheral retina samples were dissociated using papain as previously described (Fadl et al., 2020), cryopreserved in HBSS solution containing 10% DMSO and slowly frozen using a Mr. Frosty container (Invitrogen, CA, USA). CUT&RUN was performed as previously described (Skene & Henikoff, 2017) using 200-300,000 cells per experiment. Antibodies against H3K9me3 (Rabbit, cat.no. ab8898, Abcam, Cambridge, UK), H3K4me3 (Rabbit, cat.no. ab8580, Abcam, Cambridge, UK) and control IgG (Rabbit, cat.no. 011- ...
sample_data_processing: Cut&Run datasets have been processed by trimming the adaptors using cutadapt (Martin, 2011), Read were mapping locally with bowtie2 (Langmead & Salzberg, 2012) allowing dovetail on a chimeric genome (Human hg38, S. cerevisiae S288C; E. coli ASM584v2), no internal normalization has been performed in these datasets since the proportion of read mapping on the yeast or on the bacterial genome was too low., Read mapping on the human genome have been then extracted, filtered for quality, duplicates, a ...
supplementary_files_format_and_content: Read coverage in bigwig format for each sampleConsensus super-enhancers called from Cut&Run, ChIP-seq, and ATAC-seq data in bed format
